cheer up.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to become less sad, or to make someone feel less sad
cheer up.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Cheer up! The worst is over.
They cheered up when they saw us coming along.
You both need cheering up, I think.
Here’s a bit of news that will cheer you up.
cheer up.translation[0].definitions[1].d: to make a place look more attractive
cheer up.translation[0].definitions[1].e: I bought some posters to cheer the place up a bit.
